about_the_game:
You're stuck in an endless loop, and strange mimics are after you. An unknown benevolent force is aiding your escape, but it can only buy you so much time. Study your surroundings and find the lurking fiends before it is too late, and send them to the emptiness where they belong.

Do not fall for their tricks

The mimics will mess with your surroundings and your minds in order to slow down your progress. Remain calm and be prepared for anything, including a confrontation.

Coordinate with your allies

Time is of the essence, so plan ahead and move efficiently in order to maximize your chances of escape. In the worst case scenario, sacrifices may need to be made.

Features

  • 1-4 players, online co-op

  • Multiple looping gauntlets to survive

  • 2-3 hours of play time

name: House of Mimics

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-10600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 2060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 15 GB available space

short_description: Wander through various looping environments and study your surroundings carefully to find the mimics hiding therein. Beware, however, as they will try to trick you and find a moment to strike. 1-4 player online co-op.
